mapper.sql: `id`,`distribution_no`,`name`,`type`,`type` as typeName,`province`,`city`,`contact_address`,`contact_name` ,`contact_mobile`,`customer_service_phone`,`contact_qq`,`bank`,`bank_account`,`admin_login_id` ,`api_is_open`,`expired_take`,`part_take`,`expired_refund`,`book_today`,`after_take_scene_refund` ,`app_secret`,`app_id`,`sale_channel_code`,`pay_type`,`allow_max_user_num`,`delay_entry_time` ,`deposit`,`start_date`,`end_date`,`enable`,`create_time`,`update_time`,`create_user`,`update_user` ,`whether_print`,`whether_send_sms`,`notice_url`,`whether_refund`,`whether_auto_refund_out_time` ,`whether_use_car`,`car_price`,`whether_check_ip`,`ips`,`authorized_address`,`company_no` ,`whether_more_encode`, (select name from sys_dict s where s.value=sale_channel_code and s.company_no=company_no limit 1) as sale_channel_code_name, (select name from sys_dict s where s.value=pay_type and s.company_no=company_no limit 1) as pay_type_name, (select name from sys_dict s where s.value=typeName and s.company_no=company_no limit 1) as type_name
mapper.delete:
delete from cooperation_distribution where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM cooperation_distribution WHERE api_is_open = '1' AND ENABLE = '1' AND DATE(NOW()) >= DATE(start_date) AND DATE(NOW()) <= DATE(end_date)
select count(id) from cooperation_distribution where distribution_no=#{value}
select count(id) from cooperation_distribution where admin_login_id=#{value}
